message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this incredible product! I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1800000. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you can make a decision quickly.
Alice, your initial offer is quite high for my budget. I'm very interested in this product, but I'm only able to offer $800000 at this time.  Let's see if we can find a middle ground.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $800000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm thinking of a price around $1200000, which is the minimum I'm willing to accept. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer you a price of $1400000. This is my final offer, so I hope you can meet me in the middle.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise.  While $1400000 is still a bit high, I'm willing to go up to $1000000.  Let's see if we can close the deal at that price.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to go up to $1000000, but I'm still a bit short of my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer you a price of $1200000. This is my final offer, and I hope you can see the value in the product at this price.
